Translations.Text: hati damamin vēgayen diva yana dǣ mata divuramin
kura gæṭīmen gini pupuru naṁvana dǣ matada
tavada aluyamehi ākramaṇaya karana dǣ matada divuramin
niyata vaśayenma minisā tama paramādhipatiṭa guṇamakuya
tavada ættenma ohu eyaṭa sākṣikaruvek vē
tavada ættenma ohu vastuvaṭa dæḍi lesa ælum karannek vē
namut minīvaḷaval tuḷa æti dǣ piṭa karanu labana vaga ohu nodannē da
tavada hadavat tuḷa æti dǣ heḷi karanu labana vaga (ohu nodannē) da
niyata vaśayenma edina ovungē paramādhipati ovun piḷiban̆da va sarva gnānīya
